      • callDispatcher

        private static void callDispatcher(CryptoOperation operation,
                                   java.lang.String inputDir,
                                   java.lang.String outputDir,
                                   java.lang.String cryptoKey)
        Call the dispatcher
        Parameters:
        operation - Encryption or decryption
        inputDir - Directory where the files to be encrypted/decrypted reside
        outputDir - Output directory of the cryptographics operation
        cryptoKey - Cryptographic key

      • getCryptoDir

        private static java.lang.String getCryptoDir(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine cmd,
                                             java.lang.String dirType)
        Parse command line arguments and get directory to apply crypto operation Default is the current directory
        Parameters:
        cmd - The parsed command line arguments
        dirType - It can be either the input or the output directory
        Returns:
        Parsed directory

      • getCryptoKey

                                      throws NoCryptoKeyProvided
        Parse cryptographic key from command line arguments
        Parameters:
        cmd - Access to command line arguments
        Returns:
        Path to the key
        Throws:
        NoCryptoKeyProvided
